title: Inior
author: Inior
content: My bothers and sisters patience na the only way to see front for this business oo, everything for this space they work with time, investing in crypto  be like when somebody plant tree, make I ask, when you plant tree na that thesame day or month or year you go chop the fruit? Shabi you go wait for the tree to mature first before e get fruit? Na so cryto investment dey  too.So as e stands so, my people na the tree we dey plant so.Make we no let pepper body spoil am for us,The least way you fit invest just do am and wait patiently.My people we go talk later,Make I go find something chop 😋😋

comments.author: I_Anime
comments.body: Nah  normal thing be that nah, that dem dey say Btc nor be get reach quick scheme nah process, nah that place patient for come because he go still take time for you to understand more about am, if you go dey invest for short term for Btc nah your luck because Las Las nah regret go end am. So as you talk so nah patients win am for Btc oh because in a long run your profit go sure pass. Short term investors.

comments.author: Tuclikk
comments.body: Quote from: Inior on December 14, 2023, 09:23:26 PMMy bothers and sisters patience na the only way to see front for this business oo, everything for this space they work with time, investing in crypto  be like when somebody plant tree, make I ask, when you plant tree na that thesame day or month or year you go chop the fruit? Shabi you go wait for the tree to mature first before e get fruit? Na so cryto investment dey  too.So as e stands so, my people na the tree we dey plant so.Make we no let pepper body spoil am for us,The least way you fit invest just do am and wait patiently.My people we go talk later,Make I go find something chop 😋😋Op naso e dea you know say many people wan make am fast but it doesn't do that way because crypto investment regards with patients and that time will surely come for the big profit. As you dea invest just they observe small small you go dea see better results before you know you go make am. Not only crypto ma in general everything wey you go invest it deals with a gradual process.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: Op eey8n you talk. Cryptocurrency no be wetim how some people see ahm na e be , crypto no be something you fit just start to and belong to get profit immediately.  One must get patience to get profits,  even the learning aspect of crypto,  you no fit start today dey expect say you fit dey get weitn you want immediately.  Everything about cryptocurrency is all about patience,  any person  wey no get patience no go fit make it in cryptocurrency. Success comes in crypto when patience dey.

comments.author: teamsherry
comments.body: The truth be say some kind Patients be like wast of time I swear some people don’t actually understand this Bitcoin stuffs while some really want to learn but no idea or someone to teach them. It painful that majority are just doing it Cus there is money once dy try and it fail they just give up that why is hard to be patient thoughFrom my observation, Bitcointalk.org has helped in creating wealth creation for thousands of unemployed youths.This has helped in reducing unemployment and in turn boasting the Nigerian economy through Wealth Creation. So I will advise everyone stay patient and learn before they can earn

comments.author: Jenwi
comments.body: So I will advise everyone stay patient and learn before they can earn Na so me too I think say na wetin I fit invest today then reap am tomorrow. The thing really need patience, steadfastness, and perseverance. Like OP use tree illustrate, u no fit plant tree come chop the fruit the next day, week ,month or that year. U must give an enough time. This patience don make so many people dump their investment due to say their expectations cut short.Person really need to learn before en earn.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: Quote from: Inior on December 14, 2023, 09:23:26 PMMake I go find something chop 😋😋If you like no go look for something eat before you come dey talk with people wey eye don open finished for money, and na true here na place to get patient before you moved to another level person no go just come now now expect to boom enter the next rank or even want to make huge profits within the small time frame him or she just join the forum na wetin make i dey look some newbies wey no dey get patient at all for here. People wey reach the level them dey no just appears from no where reach there them also start from somewhere to reach where them dem dey.

comments.author: Obim34
comments.body: OP, this na nice topic as na wetin we don already dey yarn since for this forum even before you join but e good as u dey very quick to understand the ways of Bitcoin.This na wetin dey worry some people dey no dey fit get this kind of patient to allow their investment for a long term as soon as little profit just enter dey don rush go sell am, some go say dey no want make the price fall below wetin dey buy this na very bad attitude to investing in Bitcoin as normally we suppose to don understand by now say Bitcoin dey very volatile and the price fit drop below our entering price but certainly as long say we continue to hold we go still make better profit from our investment

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Op as you talk am na so e be oo, crypto trade no be wattin person go do come dey expect to see changes sharp sharp, I even like the illustration wey you use as e be say na planting of tree you use because, naim be the best way to take describe crypto investment especially when we dey talk about Bitcoin investment. Bitcoin investment requires enough patience and one of the ways wey you fit take dey patient with your holding na when you learn about Bitcoin well before you invest or along the way as you don invest, because na when you learn, you go take understand say Bitcoin get limited supply compared to the investors wey ready to hold am, and economics teach us say limited supply with increase in demand go make the price increase, na why Bitcoin price na up e dey go. The more people hear about am come put body na the more e go just dey go up, though e fit get small bear movement, but that one no go last.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: Inior on December 14, 2023, 09:23:26 PMMy bothers and sisters patience na the only way to see front for this business oo, everything for this space they work with time, investing in crypto  be like when somebody plant tree, make I ask, when you plant tree na that thesame day or month or year you go chop the fruit? Shabi you go wait for the tree to mature first before e get fruit? Na so cryto investment dey  too.So as e stands so, my people na the tree we dey plant so.Make we no let pepper body spoil am for us,The least way you fit invest just do am and wait patiently.My people we go talk later,Make I go find something chop 😋😋normally you no suppose allow pressure worry you for body because na like this the journey take be, if you too rush, you fit go make decision when go affect you negatively. Even to accumulate bitcoin no be wetin we suppose use rush and big eye follow am, just invest with wetin you feet use when go give you peace of mind, life na jeje we suppose we take make we no go rush into things because we see people rushing into it.Even grieving for this forum na serious patience e require, if you want force yourself to just rank up by force, you fit de unknowingly put your account for serious danger.

comments.author: Mayor of ogba
comments.body: Quote from: Inior on December 14, 2023, 09:23:26 PMMy bothers and sisters patience na the only way to see front for this business oo, everything for this space they work with time, investing in crypto  be like when somebody plant tree, make I ask, when you plant tree na that thesame day or month or year you go chop the fruit? Na so cryto investment dey  too.So as e stands so, my people na the tree we dey plant so.Make we no let pepper body spoil am for us,The least way you fit invest just do am and wait patiently.My people we go talk later,Make I go find something chop 😋😋Op, crypto investment does not follow this thing way you talk like this o, for the crypto investment you fit they where you go they wait make your plant bear fruit other people go take your plant chop. Naim makes e no good to invest in altcoin because you might lose your money. This talk goes well with Bitcoin investment. Once you understand say Bitcoin no be way thing go give you money quickly and the price they go down and they go up too, when you invest your money in Bitcoin nobody will take it from you, and if you come hodl am for the long term like 4-5 years you go see better profit from your Bitcoin investment. But you need to get way thing go they give you money to chop food so that you no go sell your Bitcoin even when you are at a loss to fit see food chop.

comments.author: Jegileman
comments.body: Patience is virtue and for everything you do today without having the sense of patience will make it hard for you to face the challenges which are stumbling blocks to your success. Having patience in everything you do is the best type of skill you can have today. Bitcoin is an investment that requires you to be patient for a long term before you can reap the reward of it. If you’re not the patient type, you’ll end up as a short term investor which can make you think like a gambler than an investor.

comments.author: AVE5
comments.body: Without a Bitcoin investors readiness to hodl his Bitcoin on a long run in considering alternative source of income, there would always be relevant reasons why the Investor need to run out of his hodling patient otherwise, hodling is the key beneficial to be profited in the Bitcoin marketing industry.

comments.author: Inior
comments.body: Yea, that's true..You are on point✒️

comments.author: Sexylizzy2813
comments.body: This talk make brain I no go lie you, patience nai be the key for a positive growth and e hard for some people to dy patient, for this Forum if you no hold your ground and always tell yourself say you go reach where other people don reach e en pass them, like to dy motivate yourself and no let envy build house for your head, if you follow this path I believe say things go work out well for you. The hustle for life no easy, no be only for this crypto world, life in general and some people go use this pepper body take spoil that good thing wey dy wait for you for front, as for you OP your time dey come, make we dy on track.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Quote from: Inior on December 14, 2023, 09:23:26 PMMy bothers and sisters patience na the only way to see front for this business oo, everything for this space they work with time, investing in crypto  be like when somebody plant tree, make I ask, when you plant tree na that thesame day or month or year you go chop the fruit? Na so cryto investment dey  too.So as e stands so, my people na the tree we dey plant so.Make we no let pepper body spoil am for us,The least way you fit invest just do am and wait patiently.My people we go talk later,Make I go find something chop 😋😋Lol  , so you never chop as you dey talk like this, okay na, I like the way you speak and this your post make sense because E dey very important for the newbie be na newbie never experienced how to hold bitcoin, bitcoin na better investment, and you talk am say e be like plant if you plant am you go wait for the plant to maturity and after E mature and get fruit wey you go eat, na better investment wey E will never end or be like say E get time wey be say E go expire, bitcoin na for people wey get mind and people that are capable of investing in it.But as e be again bitcoin no be thing wey you go rush go invest you gast use your 99 intelligence learn how E be before you go loseguard, because mostly people wey dey scam people now many of them na people wey dey hold bitcoin them dey find, you gast shine your eyes and make sure say make no body get access to waiting you Don invest for future, because if you fuck up my brother nothing you fit do.

comments.author: odunybiz
comments.body: Quote from: Inior on December 14, 2023, 09:23:26 PMMy bothers and sisters patience na the only way to see front for this business oo, everything for this space they work with time, investing in crypto  be like when somebody plant tree, make I ask, when you plant tree na that thesame day or month or year you go chop the fruit? It not only crypto that involved been patient but I can say it's just much needed in the crypto space. Alot of people have opt out from crypto because of their impatient. Most of this people are now blaming themselves today because most have their coin in lost out of not being patient. Just like OP has said, let's invest with patient and wait for the outcome in future.

comments.author: sotelorene
comments.body: Quote from: Inior on December 14, 2023, 09:23:26 PMMy bothers and sisters patience na the only way to see front for this business oo, everything for this space they work with time, investing in crypto  be like when somebody plant tree, make I ask, when you plant tree na that thesame day or month or year you go chop the fruit? Shabi you go wait for the tree to mature first before e get fruit? Na so cryto investment dey  too.So as e stands so, my people na the tree we dey plant so.Make we no let pepper body spoil am for us,The least way you fit invest just do am and wait patiently.My people we go talk later,Make I go find something chop 😋😋Op,  na true say patient na em be the goal to everything but you suppose  know say sometimes when we plant e no go grow,  sometimes e go grow die and sometimes e  go grow wella reason because e get factor wey dey affect am na so Bitcoin dey too and Bitcoin get em own factor wey dey affect and again e get some crops wey be say if we plant am we fit harvest for 2 to 3 months and e get some wey be say if you plant am you fit harvest for like 6 to 12 months na there we come get long term and short term investment. However,  me I believe say no be by patient alone go make us achieve or make our dreams come through but we gats dey consistent too because consistency na em be the main thing, we must  be consistent no matter the palava we see.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Inior on December 14, 2023, 09:23:26 PMMy bothers and sisters patience na the only way to see front for this business oo, everything for this space they work with time, investing in crypto  be like when somebody plant tree, make I ask, when you plant tree na that thesame day or month or year you go chop the fruit? Shabi you go wait for the tree to mature first before e get fruit? Na so cryto investment dey  too.So as e stands so, my people na the tree we dey plant so.Make we no let pepper body spoil am for us,The least way you fit invest just do am and wait patiently.My people, we can talk later,Make I go find something chop 😋😋One thing that Bitcoin most especially have taught me is patience and timing,  it is very important to give a long-term perspective to everything we do at all times and this includes the timing we allocate to our investments and how we follow up with our plans without giving in to pressures as there may come along the way,  many who have witnessed most loses in this cryptocurrency industry at those who take cryptocurrencies as a get rich scheme and not a journey because most time it takes a long time for your investment to materialized and to record a significant profits this is most suitable for all time and at most the best journey motivation for me. Taking Bitcoin or everything related to this industry as a journey and on a long-term basis is what makes for why and how we take and experience the outcome of everything that we do as we journey heads,  but above all,  we need all the motivations that we can get and we should and must try as much as possible to stick to the path that can lead to a profitable future as an asset which is bitcoin and try as much as possible to avoid any crypto coin that give us too high profits promises most times these coins are just pump and dump projects,  and should only be considered as a gamble and nothing more to that.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: I agree with you, OP, but like I always say, some people cannot actually invest in and hold Bitcoin without having a good source of income. Some people are facing different financial situations in their lives; even if they invest in Bitcoin, once they are faced with some kind of financial need, they will still end up selling off their coin. First, before some can be patient in holding their coin, they should have a good-paying job and probably some side hustle to support their finances. If they receive a salary, they should endeavor to save up some fiat as emergency funds and only allot the amount of bitcoin that they can actually hold for a long time with any need that will require them to sell off so quickly. By so doing, they are planting a good seed, which will not just be cute off so short when the time is not yet due to reap the good fruit.Some people invest the amount of money that they cannot hold for a long time, and because of that, they also don't get comfortable when they see the price of Bitcoin going down. One step to archiving a successful Bitcoin investment is to acquire proper knowledge about it.
